digest:
- *zkLoRA* integrates LoRA fine-tuning with zero-knowledge proofs for secure, efficient LLM adaptation, ensuring privacy and correctness. Read more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.21393
- *Integrating Large Language Models with Network Optimization* for enhanced supply chain planning through explainable AI and real-time decision support. More details: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.21622
- *SLAC's SNL* accelerates neural networks on FPGAs for real-time data reduction, outperforming existing tools in latency and resource efficiency. Learn more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.21739
- *Beyond Prediction: Reinforcement Learning as the Defining Leap in Healthcare AI* transforms healthcare AI by enabling proactive interventions, integrating diverse data sources, and addressing ethical challenges. Explore further: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.21101
- *Atom-Searcher* enhances LLMs' reasoning with Atomic Thought and ATR, improving efficiency and interpretability in complex tasks. Discover more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.12800
- *FedSEA-LLaMA* enhances federated learning for LLMs with improved security, efficiency, and adaptability, achieving significant performance gains. Check it out: https://arxiv.org/abs/2505.15683
- *Med-RewardBench* introduces a benchmark for evaluating medical reward models and judges in multimodal large language models, addressing critical gaps. Read here: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.21430
- *TrustGeoGen* offers a verified data engine for geometric problem solving, addressing LLM limitations with robust benchmarks and multimodal integration. Find out more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15780
